info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pender and very southeastern Bladen Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Malpass Corner, or 7 miles west of Burgaw, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Rowan, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Long Creek, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, St. Helena and Atkinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
